task.title: Turning Bluetooth® on and off
task.shortdesc: Turn off Bluetooth when you are not using it to save battery power. Also, turned it off in places where using a wireless device is not allowed (for example on board an aircraft).

taskbody.context: This topic explains how to turn Bluetooth on and off.

step.cmd: From the home menu, select Bluetooth and then select Settings > Wireless & networks.
Select or clear the Bluetooth check box.
